body.name: NEZZOE Makeup Mirror Touch Screen Vanity Mirror with LED Brightness Adjustable Portable USB Rechargeable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 58 mins
features: 33 Highly Bright LED Lights - This makeup mirror provides bright and clear reflection; allows your face is clearly visible; Can be used for makeup, skin care, shaving, etc.
Rechargeable Lighted Makeup Mirror - Built-in 1200mAh battery provides up to 3 hours of working time for desk mirror at maximum brightness with bright natural lights.
Smart Touch Dimmable - Just press the touch switch of the makeup mirror to turn on the light; long press the touch screen button to adjust the brightness as you needed.

Adjustable angles - Meet 30° and 100° freely adjusted and fixed ensuring a perfect and comfortable viewing angle, makes the vanity mirror flexible and allows you to view yourself from any angles. two angles, tripod structure, stable place table.
Simple and Easy to Carry - Compact and portable folding design, you can easily put the light up mirror into your handbag or luggage for perfect travel use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, Adjustable, Good Quality.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my mom, I opened it before Christmas to check that it was ok, delivery was great, I will update this when she gets it! So far I think it’s great.Edit: She loved it, only complaint was that it ran out of battery really fast and she hasn’t had time to charge it so it’s dead, other than that she said she liked that she could adjust the brightness and the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern Bath Counter Mirror
reviews.reviewText: Large enough to see your full face, but lightweight enough to hold up to comb back of hair.Very clean/modern lines. Looks great on a bath counter and the full frame light is darn powerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars compact and bright but not sturdy
reviews.reviewText: this mirror is pretty compact and it's very bright, the battery lasts a very long time. I bought this mirror back in June 2021 and it's now October 2022. I've only had to charge the battery 4 times in over a year. Granted, I don't use the mirror for very long. I'd say I use the mirror for about 20-25 minutes and it lasted me a really long time still. Obviously, if you use the mirror a lot or for hours at a time doing complex looks, it'll definitely take more charging. the mirror is nice and the only complaint I have is the stand on the back. it's super flimsy and just recently broke the other day. the mirror has become wobbly and doesn't stay up right unless it is propped against something. I think if the stand was designed differently or maybe even just with thicker material, it would have been a lot more stable. I won't be purchasing this mirror again due to this issue but it's definitely not a bad product. It's cheap and I think I got my money's worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure what to expect, but I was really impressed by this mirror! It’s perfect, couldn’t ask for a better product for the prize ($20ish)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's the perfect size, the stand is really convenient and adjustable and I love that it has a light. The light is even adjustable too. Without being charged in between, the light lasted about 3 weeks with me using it every day. It is a regular mirror though so if you're looking for a mirror to magnify your face this isn't it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the brightest
reviews.reviewText: I like the compact size. The stand and touch screen work. I just wish it were brighter. Even up close it's not great. I wear a (very bright) headlamp flashlight when using it, so it's as bright as I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this mirror! The light is great, it's easy to tell when you need to charge because the light begins to get dim. Easy to charge, lasts through lots of uses before needing to charge again, the stand can be adjusted for a different tilt.Only downside for me is I wish it had a cover- but not a deal breaker for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little mirror
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is great as expected. The light is nice and bright with adjustable light settings which is nice. Seems to be holding up. Charge right out of the box has lasted a whole week so far with being used everyday for approximately 5 to 10 minutes

It works really well and its size is very convenient. It’s small and light enough for me to pack and use anywhere, but also big enough for everyday use. The light is great as well, it can be very bright or dim and is easily adjustable. It also lasts a very long time - the light worked when I first opened the package and I haven’t charged it at all (although I’ve only used it for 10-20 minutes everyday for the past 3 weeks). Basically, the product does what it’s supposed to do really well.

reviews.reviewerName: Chegou super rápido, antes do prazo. Ótimo produto.

reviews.reviewText: It is a staple product for travel if you put on makeup. You don’t have to rely on natural lighting or find a perfect light to put on your makeup.
Works well, has a unique touch enabled dimming/brightening feature and is the perfect size for travel but big enough for everyday use. Very pleased with this one and no it’s not a paid review.
Atende bem a função de espelho e tem o acréscimo de luz para iluminar o rosto
